description: This table stores the patient genomic indicators recevied from external sources.

columns.name: DOCUMENT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the document record.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: PGI_REF_ID
columns.description: The unique reference identifier associated with the PGI.

columns.name: PGI_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The type of Genomic Indicator.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Drug


Disease

columns.name: PGI_NAME
columns.description: The name of the Genomic Indicator.

columns.name: PGI_ADDED_DATE
columns.description: Date the Genomic Indicator was added to the patient.

columns.name: PGI_DESC_ID
columns.description: Stores the description of the genomic indicator.

columns.name: PGI_SHRD_WITH_PAT_YN
columns.description:
True if the Genomic Indicator has been shared with the patient.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: PGI_OVERVIEW_NOTE_ID
columns.description: The overview note associated with the patient genomic indicator.

columns.name: PGI_CHECKSUM
columns.description: The checksum of the patient genomic indicator.

columns.name: PGI_LAST_UPD_INST_DTTM
columns.description: Stores the last time the patient genomic indicator has been updated.

columns.name: PGI_SRC_DXR_CSN
columns.description: The contact serial number of the DXR record that owns the instance of this patient genomic indicator.

columns.name: PGI_VISIBLE_TO_ALL_YN
columns.description:
This item stores if the patient genomic indicator can be viewed by all users. If set to No only users with Genomics View All security can view this inidcator.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: PGI_SHRD_WITH_PAT_YN
